entry.title: No Graves for the Forgotten
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,769Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 19

Summary: He’s the face behind the throne.The ghost of a golden palace.The man married to the monster who destroyed everything.Stiles Stilinski has learned how to disappear in plain sight — with soft lips, dangerous eyes, and a body trained to please, not to feel.Derek Hale should hate him.But everything about Stiles is a provocation: the low voice, the crooked smile, the whispered secrets in the shadows of rebellion.They meet by accident.Then, by necessity.Soon, by desire.But Stiles carries secrets that could bring empires down — and an emptiness only Derek seems to see.In a world where love is a weapon and loyalty is a convenient lie, some sparks don’t fade.They burn everything in their path.

entry.title: BLOODLINE PROTOCOL
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,034Chapters: 6/12Kudos: 19

Summary: At Beacon Hills Preparatory, tradition is everything. For over a century, the elite boarding school has divided its student body into five historic houses where each one seemingly determined by a mix of academic performance, behavior, and an unspoken layer of socioeconomic legacy. Most students follow in the footsteps of their families; generation after generation they're sorted into the same houses. No one questions the system. It’s simply the way things are. Until now.Midway through his freshman year, a “routine” blood test for school health records takes an unexpected turn. One sharp-witted yet grounded Stiles, recently appointed as House Prefect of the mid-tier House Flagstaff largely due to his father’s position as the town sheriff, is abruptly reassigned to House Redwood, the school’s most elite and secretive house.He must now navigate secret traditions, political manipulation, and a slow-burning forbidden romance with someone he was never meant to meet: the enigmatic sophomore son of a ruthless defense attorney.

entry.title: Of All The Names I Gave You, My Favourite One is MINE!
entry.summary:
Author: NiklausScratchIII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,399Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 72

Summary: Stiles is the new wolf in town, on the run from something he's not ready to face. Derek is a new single parent, and has no idea what he's doing, but hes doing his best dammit. A desperate moment finds the two wolves forging a unplanned bond that might just heal them both. Will their vastly different needs find a way to align, or is a neighbor wolf just a neighbor wolf at the end of the day.orDerek is drowning in single parenthood. Stiles loves babies. Derek might be ready for love even if it's not ready for him. Stiles has a dark past and big secret. And Eli...hes just a baby.

entry.title: Cologne 2: Electric Bugaboo
entry.summary:
Author: blueinkedbones

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,101Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 48

Summary: “It was an accident,” Stiles says. “Derek, it's not even bad, I swear.”But there are—claw marks on Stiles' shoulder. Still bleeding.And his heartbeat is going a thousand miles an hour.“It's not Eli's fault,” Stiles says, and Derek goes deaf, for a while. Stiles is still talking, rambling, excusing all of it. Derek just breathes, and pulls pain.It takes too long to remember that human bleeding doesn't stop on its own. And then—Derek's speeding through the hotel room.Bandages. And—disinfectant, isn't that—There should be a first aid kit somewhere.“I should've just found a band-aid or something,” Stiles says. “Or asked one of the million people we know who were around. I just... Eli wouldn't wanna be a funny anecdote.”That brings Derek's voice back. “How is this funny? He hurt you.”“See, this is why I didn't wanna tell you,” Stiles says, and Derek stares at him. “Until after the wedding, at least. So I could actually explain, without our whole extended werewolf family catching everything.”Well, they're alone now. “So explain.”

entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,935Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 873

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.

entry.title: Pack Scent
entry.summary:
Author: theauthoress

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,259Chapters: 3/8Kudos: 250

Summary: “What’s going on?”Scott made a strange, whiny noise at the back of his throat that made him sound a little like a kicked puppy. “Your scent.” He pulled on Stiles’s hoodie until their noses were practically touching.“Scott, buddy, you’re going to have to be more specific.” Stiles rubbed a circle on the back of Scott’s hand with his thumb. “You know I don’t have werewolf senses.”“You smell like… like…” Scott fumbled for words, his brow furrowed deeply. His eyes started to look a little wet, and that was something Stiles could not deal with.“Hey, hey, it’s okay. I’m okay. Just tell me what’s wrong and we’ll fix it. I’ll—I dunno—shower really good, I promise.”“You smell like something claimed you,” Scott finally said in a horrified whisper.

entry.title: Redlight
entry.summary:
Author: mossriddened

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,384Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Stiles saw the red light, staring ahead as it passed– overhead and kept going. He didn’t even stop.He didn’t even flinch.It felt almost as if he wasn’t in the driver’s seat, not mentally at least; he was somewhere behind the wheel instead, watching through the windshield as if it were nothing more than a screen. He felt floaty; he felt detached.He barely registered the speedometer as it quietly climbed and the streetlights began to streak into lines.He barely registers when red and blue lights join in the mix behind him, blinding almost in the rearview mirrors as its colors blend together; the glow didn’t make sense; surely, he was just tired.It was just the lights.–––––––––or . .Stiles Stilinski gets put on house arrest for his own safety after breaking several traffic violations and running from the police. Although he can no longer drive away from his problems, he finds them, instead, in his reflection.
